org.hps.recon.particle

Class HpsReconParticleDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.particle.ReconParticleDriver
        • org.hps.recon.particle.HpsReconParticleDriver

  • public class HpsReconParticleDriver
extends ReconParticleDriver
    The main HPS implementation of ReconParticleDriver. Method generates V0 candidates and does vertex fits.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Represents a type of constraint for vertex fitting.

        Whether to use a fixed Z position for the 2016 run. By default this is turned on.

      • beamPositionToUse

        private double[] beamPositionToUse
        The actual beam position passed to the vertex fitter. This can come from the parent class's default or steering settings, or the conditions database, depending on flag settings.

      • setUseInternalVertexXYPositions

        @Deprecated
public void setUseInternalVertexXYPositions(boolean b)
        Deprecated. Use setUseBeamPositionConditions(boolean) instead.
        This method used to activate usage of the internal map of run numbers to beam positions. Now, it activates usage of the beam positions from the conditions database instead. This should result in the same behavior as before, and steering files should not need to be updated (though eventually they should be).

      • setUseBeamPositionConditions

        public void setUseBeamPositionConditions(boolean b)
        Set whether to use beam positions from the database.
        Parameters:
        b - True to use beam positions from the database

      • process

        protected void process(EventHeader event)
        Processes the track and cluster collections in the event into reconstructed particles and V0 candidate particles and vertices. These reconstructed particles are then stored in the event.
        Overrides:
        process in class ReconParticleDriver
        Parameters:
        event - - The event to process.

      • findVertices

        protected void findVertices(List<ReconstructedParticle> electrons,
                            List<ReconstructedParticle> positrons)
        Creates reconstructed V0 candidate particles and vertices for electron positron pairs using no constraints, beam constraints, and target constraints. These are saved to the appropriate lists in the super class.
        Specified by:
        findVertices in class ReconParticleDriver
        Parameters:
        electrons - - The list of electrons.
        positrons - - The list of positrons.

      • fitVertex

        private BilliorVertex fitVertex(HpsReconParticleDriver.Constraint constraint,
                                ReconstructedParticle electron,
                                ReconstructedParticle positron)
        Fits a vertex from an electron/positron track pair using the indicated constraint.
        Parameters:
        constraint - - The constraint type to use.
        electron - - The electron track.
        positron - - The positron track.
        Returns:
        Returns the reconstructed vertex as a BilliorVertex object. mg--8/14/17--add the displaced vertex refit for the UNCONSTRAINED and BS_CONSTRAINED fits

      • makeReconstructedParticle

        public static ReconstructedParticle makeReconstructedParticle(ReconstructedParticle electron,
                                                              ReconstructedParticle positron,
                                                              BilliorVertex vtxFit)
        Creates a reconstructed V0 candidate particle from an electron, positron, and billior vertex.
        Parameters:
        electron - - The electron.
        positron - - The positron.
        vtxFit - - The billior vertex.
        Returns:
        Returns a reconstructed particle with properties generated from the child particles and vertex given as an argument.
